item.content:encoded: Some years ago I went to the Borghese while in Rome, which has multiple Bernini masterpieces. I spotted this one, saw it was Bernini, and wondered what was so special about it because it wasn't anywhere close to as good as the others Turned out he sculpted it when he was 11. Oh.
